title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
preparation:
1. Cook the spaghetti.
2. Fry the bacon.
3. Mix the eggs and cheese.
4. Combine all together with the spaghetti and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
preparation:
1. Grill the chicken.
2. Make the tomato gravy.
3. Combine the chicken with the gravy.
4. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).
preparation:
1. Sauté the beef with onions and mushrooms.
2. Add the sour cream and mustard.
3. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
4. Serve over pasta or rice.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A Thai stir-fried rice noodle dish with eggs, tofu, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.
preparation:
1. Cook the rice noodles.
2. Stir-fry the tofu and eggs.
3. Add the noodles and sauce.
4. Garnish with peanuts and serve.

title: Tacos
summary: Mexican dish with folded or rolled tortillas filled with various ingredients.
preparation:
1. Cook the ground beef with spices.
2. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
3. Top with salsa and serve.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple Italian pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
preparation:
1. Roll out the pizza dough.
2. Spread tomato sauce and add mozzarella.
3. Bake in the oven.
4. Garnish with fresh basil and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A salad of romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
preparation:
1. Toss the lettuce with croutons and Parmesan.
2. Drizzle with Caesar dressing.
3. Mix well and serve.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish of tomatoes, zucchini, and eggplant.
preparation:
1. Sauté the vegetables.
2. Simmer them in a tomato-based sauce.
3. Serve hot or at room temperature.

title: Shakshuka
summary: A North African dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce.
preparation:
1. Sauté the peppers and onions.
2. Add tomatoes and spices.
3. Poach the eggs in the sauce.
4. Serve with bread.

title: Falafel
summary: Deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas and spices.
preparation:
1. Blend the chickpeas with garlic, onions, and spices.
2. Form into balls and fry until golden.
3. Serve with pita bread and tahini sauce.

title: Sushi
summary: A Japanese dish with vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables.
preparation:
1. Prepare the sushi rice.
2. Place the rice on seaweed and add fillings.
3. Roll and cut into pieces.
4. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A rich soup made with caramelized onions and beef broth, topped with cheese.
preparation:
1. Caramelize the onions.
2. Add beef broth and simmer.
3. Serve with toasted baguette and melted cheese on top.
